titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish an emerging developer fund program to provide competitve grants to nonprofit housing organizations and community develpoment financial institutions, and for other purposes.

A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish an emerging developer fund program to provide competitve grants to nonprofit housing organizations and community develpoment financial institutions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
